actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and make permanent the standard deduction for real property taxes.
short_title: Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2011

summary.text: Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make the standard tax deduction for real property taxes permanent; and (2) repeal the dollar limitation on such deduction and the exclusion of foreign real property taxes.

titles.title: Complete and Permanent Property Tax Deduction Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and make permanent the standard deduction for real property taxes.
